channel.title: 667/704 NPCDrops
channel.description: Ok so I got the hang of 667/704. I pretty know what I need to, except I have no ideaaaaaaa how to repack my NPCDrops.. i need it because I customized some itembonuses, making them more desireable. So I want to bring down the drop rate, etc. Can someoooooooone please teach me how to repack unpackedDrops? thanks :o
